tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE FoundationGrant ( 
    grant_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    recipient_name VARCHAR(255), 
    grant_amount DECIMAL(10,2), 
    grant_date DATE 
)

CREATE TABLE grants (
  grant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  grant_amount DECIMAL,
  grant_date DATE,
  recipient_organization VARCHAR(255),
  purpose TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE donors (
  donor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  donor_name VARCHAR(255),
  donation_amount DECIMAL,
  donation_date DATE,
  donation_method VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE funders (
  funder_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  funder_name VARCHAR(255),
  funding_amount DECIMAL,
  funding_date DATE,
  funding_purpose TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE grants (
    grant_id INT,
    grant_name VARCHAR(255),
    amount DECIMAL(10,2),
    recipient_id INT,
    grant_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE grant_relationships (
    relationship_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    grant_id INT,
    funder_id INT,
    recipient_id INT,
    category_id INT
);
